mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectDatabaseList * Description : DB 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT D.DB_ID , D.DB_NM , D.DB_EXP , S.DB_SVR_ID , S.DB_SVR_NM , S.IPADR , S.PORTNO , S.DFT_DB_NM , S.SVR_SPR_USR_ID , S.SVR_SPR_SCM_PWD FROM T_DB_I D, T_DBSVR_I S, T_USRDBAUT_I A WHERE D.DB_SVR_ID=S.DB_SVR_ID AND D.DB_ID = A.DB_ID AND S.DB_SVR_ID=#{db_svr_id} AND A.usr_id=#{usr_id} AND D.USEYN = 'Y' AND A.AUT_YN = 'Y'
mapper.delete: /** * Query ID : deleteDbAccessControl * Description : DB 접근제어 전체 삭제 * Author : 김주영 **/ DELETE FROM T_SVRACSCNTR_I WHERE DB_SVR_ID=#{db_svr_id}
